unit.name: Glade Lord
unit.description: Equipment: Woodelf Bow. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Spellweaver
unit.description: Magic: A Spellweaver is a Level 4 wizard. Equipment: Woodelf Bow. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Treeman Ancient
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Large Target, Scaly Skin (3+), Terror, Stubborn, Forest Spirit, Strangle Roots, Wall of Vines PM 2/5+. Note: This unit counts against the number of Treemen in the army!

unit.name: Master Shadowdancer
unit.description: Magic: A Master Shadowdancer is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Additional hand weapon. Special Rules: Immune to Psychology, Talismanic Tattoos, Wardancer, Disciple of Loec.

unit.name: Wild Rider Lord
unit.description: Equipment: Woodelf Bow, spear and light armour. Special Rules: Talismanic Tattoos, Forest Spirit, Hatred.

unit.name: Battle Standard
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Spellsinger
unit.description: Magic: A Spellsinger is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Woodelf Bow.

unit.name: Glade Noble
unit.description: Equipment: Woodelf Bow. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Shadowdancer
unit.description: Magic: A Shadowdancer is a Level 1 wizard. Equipment: Additional hand weapon. Special Rules: Immune to Psychology, Talismanic Tattoos, Wardancer, Disciple of Loec.

unit.name: Branchwraith
unit.description: Magic: A Branchwraith is a Level 1 wizard. Equipment: Hand Weapon. Special Rules: Forest Spirit, Scaly Skin (5+).

unit.name: Wild Rider Noble
unit.description: Equipment: Woodelf Bow, spear and light armour. Special Rules: Talismanic Tattoos, Forest Spirit, Hatred.

unit.name: Glade Guard
unit.description: Equipment: Woodelf Bow. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Spearman
unit.description: Equipment: Spear, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Anti-Cav (spear).

unit.name: Dryad
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Fear, Light Infantry, Forest Spirits, Scaly Skin (5+).

unit.name: Glade Rider
unit.description: Mount: Elven Steed. Equipment: Woodelf Bow and spear. Special Rules: Light Cavalry.

unit.name: Deepwood Scout
unit.description: Equipment: Woodelf Bow. Special Rules: Light Infantry, Scout.

unit.name: Eternal Guard
unit.description: Equipment: Eternal Guard weapons and heavy armour. Special Rules: Stubborn, Anti-Cav (Eternal Guard weapons).

unit.name: Wildwood Ranger
unit.description: Equipment: Halberd and light armour. Special Rules: Guardians of the Wildwood, Immune to Fear.

unit.name: Wardancer
unit.description: Equipment: Additional hand weapons. Special Rules: Skirmish, Immune to Psychology, Distract, Talismanic Tattoos, Wardancer.

unit.name: Wild Rider
unit.description: Mount: Steed of Kurnous. Equipment: Spear and light armour. Special Rules: Light Cavalry, Fear, Talismanic Tattoos, Forest Spirits, Hatred (rider only).

unit.name: Warhawk Rider
unit.description: Mount: Warhawk. Equipment: Woodelf Bow and spear. Special Rules: Flying Skirmishers, Hit and Run, March Blocker.

unit.name: Treekin
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Fear, Forest Spirits, Scaly Skin (4+).

unit.name: Waywatcher
unit.description: Equipment: Woodelf Bow and additional hand weapons. Special Rules: Skirmish, Scout, Forest Stalkers, Lethal Shot.

unit.name: Sister of the Thorn
unit.description: Mount: Steed of Isha. Equipment: Blackbriar javelin and light armour. Special Rules: Light Cavalry, Forest Spirits, Daughters of Eternity, Deepwood Coven.

unit.name: Treeman
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Large Target, Scaly Skin (3+), Terror, Stubborn, Forest Spirit.

unit.name: Great Eagle
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, March Blocker.

mount.name: Elven Steed
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Light Cavalry.

mount.name: Steed of Isha
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Light Cavalry, Forest Spirit. Character gets the Forest Spirit special rule.

mount.name: Steed of Kurnous
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Light Cavalry, Forest Spirit. Character gets the Forest Spirit special rule.

mount.name: Great Stag
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Light Cavalry, Forest Spirit, Daemonic Ward Save (5+).

mount.name: Unicorn
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Light Cavalry, Forest Spirit, Impale (1), MR (2), Daemonic Ward Save (5+). Character gets the Forest Spirit special rule.

mount.name: Great Eagle
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon Special Rules: Flying Model, March Blocker. Note: Does not count against the number of Great Eagles in the army in regard to point costs!

mount.name: Giant Eagle
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, March Blocker.

mount.name: Dragon
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Scaly Skin (3+), Poisonous Breath.

item.name: Amaranth. Brooch
Amaranthine Brooch
item.description: Ward Save (3+) vs non magical attacks

item.name: Amber Pendant
item.description: Models on foot only. Enemies in btb suffer from ASL

item.name: Annoyance of Netlings
item.description: Opponents in challenges only hit on 6s.

item.name: Armour of the Fey
item.description: Ward Save (4+) against magical cc attacks only

item.name: Asrai Archery
item.description: All Woodelves do not suffer the -1 penalty for moving and shooting.

item.name: Athels Wrath PM 2/6+
Athels Wrath PM 3/6+
Athels Wrath PM 2/5+
Athels Wrath PM 3/5+
item.description: (5+): Augment, Range 18", unit gets AP(1) (cc as well as shooting), until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on magic items.

item.name: BM Ariels Blessing
item.description: (7+) Augment, Range 18", unit gains Regeneration (5+) until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Call of the Hunt
item.description: (10+) Augment, Range 18", each model in the target unit gets +1A (mounts are not affected) and +2M until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Fury of the Forest
item.description: (5+) MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Orions Spear
item.description: (9+) MM, Range 24", 1 hit like bolt thrower (S6, no AS, D3 wounds, penetrates ranks)

item.name: BM Phantasmagoria
item.description: (6+) Hex, Range 18", target unit suffers -2WS (to a minimum of 1) until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Strangle Root Curse
item.description: (8+) Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers -1M, -1WS, -1BS and -1I until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM The Twilight Host
item.description: (6+) Augment, Range 18", unit causes fear. If it already causes fear, unit causes terror instead. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Trickery
item.description: (7+) Hex, Range 18", target unit has to reroll successful armor and ward saves (of any kind but does not affect regeneration) until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Undergrowth
item.description: (7+) Hex or Augment, Range 18", target unit counts as being in difficult terrain and light cover until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Unnerving Whispers
item.description: (8+) Hex, Range 18", needs LOS, target unit must take a panic test (Units that are Immune to Psychology are immune to this spell).

item.name: Banner of Dwindling
item.description: Enemies that break from this unit in cc roll 1D6 less for their flee distance.

item.name: Banner of Midwinter
item.description: Use at the start of any turn. Unit is Unbreakable until the end of the turn. Cannot be used by Skirmishers or broken units. One use only.

item.name: Banner of Springtide
item.description: Unit may always stand and shoot no matter how close the enemy is.

item.name: Banner of Zenith
item.description: Enemies may not march within 12" of this unit (instead of the normal 8").

item.name: Befuddlement of Mischiefs
Befuddlement of Mis.
item.description: PM 2/6+, Hex, Range 18", target unit that is not Immune to Psychology is subject to Stupidity in its next turn.

item.name: Blackbriar javelin
item.description: Thrown weapon, Range 12", S4

item.name: Blades of Loec
item.description: Counts as additional hand weapons. In addition the bearer rerolls failed to-wound rolls in cc.

item.name: Blight of Terrors
item.description: Bearer causes Terror.

item.name: Bow of Loren
item.description: Range 30", Number of shots equal to number of attacks of the bearer at S4 AP(2), no modifiers for multiple shots

item.name: Briarhearth
item.description: Light armour, Bearer is at -1 to hit by missiles, increased to -2 if bearer is completely in a wood. Models on foot only.

item.name: Children of the Wood
item.description: All units ignore movement penalties when moving through woods. Fliers also may start and end their movement in woods. Forest Fighter: The Woodelf Player may always decide to play on a map with 2+ woods.

item.name: Cluster of Radiants
item.description: +1 DD

item.name: Daiths Reaper
item.description: Reroll failed to-hit rolls in cc. Enemy has to reroll successful armour saves.

item.name: Daughters of Eternity
item.description: Ward Save (5+) vs ranged attacks and spells.

item.name: Dawn Spear
item.description: Counts as a spear. Enemy units that take a wound suffer -1 to hit for the rest of the phase.

item.name: Deepwood Coven
item.description: This unit may cast one of the following spells in each magic phase: - Thorns of Isha (PM 2/5+): Hex, Range 18", if the target moves in its next movement phase then it suffers D6 S3 hits. The effect of the spell last until the next magic phase. - Ishas Blessing (PM 2/5+): Augment, Range 18". Place a marker on target unit. Every time the unit would suffer a wound remove a marker, i.e. for each marker removed one wound is ignored.

item.name: Disciple of Loec
item.description: The model may combine the effects of two Shadowdances each turn and may choose the same dance in consecutive rounds of combat but not the exact same combination. If the model is part of a unit of Wardancers, then the Shadowdance of the unit has to be part of the combination of Shadowdances of the Disciple of Loec.

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Distract
item.description: At the start of each combat phase a unit of Wardancers may force one model it is in close combat with to direct all its attacks at the unit of Wardancers (including character models that are part of the unit). Distract has no effect on models that fight in a challenge.

item.name: Divination Orb
item.description: Any spell cast by the enemy using more than 3 PD may be dispelled with one additional free DD.

item.name: Elynetts Brooch
item.description: Bearer and unit reroll failed psychology tests.

item.name: Enchanted Shield
item.description: Shield that grants +2 AS

item.name: Eternal Guard weapons
item.description: Models count as fighting with spears. In addition models in base to base contact with an opponent get +1A.

item.name: Fimbulwinter Shard
Fimbulwint. Shard
item.description: Bearer and mount are -1 to hit in cc. A mount with the “Large Target" special rule does not benefit from this effect and is hit as normal. In addition, any unit with the “Forest Spirit" special rule which starts its turn within 6" of the bearer gains the “Stupidity" special rule until the start of its next turn.

item.name: Forest Spirit
item.description: - All Forest Spirits are Immune to Psychology. - All attacks (ranged and cc) of Forest Spirits count as magical - Forest Spirit characters can only join a unit with the Forest Spirit trait. Units of Forest Spirits can only be joined by characters with the Forest Spirit trait. A Treeman Ancient may not join any units.

item.name: Forest Stalkers
item.description: Additional -1 modifier for shooting at this unit. This unit may be set up like Scouts but can ignore the minimum distance to enemy units as long as it is out of sight. In addition this unit may be set up in sight of enemy units but has to stay at least 12" away.

item.name: Glamourweave
item.description: Ward Save (4+) vs all shooting and magic missiles. Models that like to attack the bearer must pass a Ld-test or will need natural 6s to hit the bearer in that combat phase.

item.name: Guardians of the Wildwood
item.description: When the unit is deployed the Wood Elves player has to decide if it starts the game with or without the "Light Infantry" special rule. At the start of the "remaining movement" phase the, if the unit is not in cc, it may choose to gain or lose the "Light Infantry" special rule.

item.name: Gwythercs Horn
item.description: Use at start of any bearers turn. Bearer and unit are immune to psychology until the bearers next turn. One use only.

item.name: Hail of Doom Arrow
item.description: Range 30", S4, Multiple Shots (3D6). One use only.

item.name: Helm of the Hunt
item.description: +1 AS. +1WS and +1A on the charge.

item.name: Hidden Ways PM 2/6+
Hidden Ways PM 3/6+
Hidden Ways PM 2/5+
Hidden Ways PM 3/5+
item.description: (5+): Augment, cast on itself or friendly character model on foot with US1 (in both cases) within 12". Place the model completely within a wood anywhere on the table but no closer than 1" to an enemy unit.

item.name: Hit and Run
item.description: If this unit charged and loses or ties combat in the following combat phase, it has to retreat. If this unit won combat, it is allowed to retreat. A retreat follows the same rules as if the unit had to flee from combat but it does not cause panic, the enemy is not allowed to pursue and this unit automatically rallies at the end of the flee movement.

item.name: Horn of the Asrai
item.description: Use at the start of any enemy turn. Enemy units able to charge the bearer must do so unless they pass a Ld test. One use only.

item.name: Hunters Talon
item.description: Woodelf Bow, Sniper

item.name: Lethal Shot
item.description: Shots at short range gain the Killing Blow special rule. Cannot be used with magical bows.

item.name: Merciws Locus
item.description: Bearer and anyone attacking the bearer do not gain any S bonuses from weapons.

item.name: Mirage PM 2/5+
Mirage PM 3/5+
item.description: Hex, Range 24", target unit cannot march until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Mischief PM 2/5+
Mischief PM 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target unit gets KB in cc. If the unit already has KB then the KB is improved to work on a 5+. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Moonstone of the H. Ways
Moonstone of Hidden Ways
Moonstone of H. Ways
item.description: At the end of your movement phase, if the bearer and his unit are completely in a wood, they may be removed from the table and placed completely in any wood on the table facing in any direction. One use only.

item.name: Murder of Spites
item.description: +D6 magical attacks in cc at bearers WS, I4 and S3. Equipment and special rules of the bearer have no effect on these attacks.

item.name: Muster of Maelvolents
item.description: Shooting attack with 360° AOS, Range 6", D6 S3 magical shots that always hit on 4+ and can be fired in addition to another missile weapon and at a different unit. Can always stand and shoot, regardless of distance and LOS.

item.name: Oaken Armour
item.description: Light armour, Regeneration (4+)

item.name: Pageant of Skrikes
item.description: Range 18", S4, Sniper, magical shot that always hit on 3+. Can be fired in addition to another missile weapon and at a different unit. May not stand and shoot.

item.name: Poisonous Breath
item.description: Breath weapon, S2, AP(3)

item.name: Power Stone
item.description: +2PD to cast a spell. Dice used may exceed maximum allowed by level. One use only.

item.name: Railarians Mantle
item.description: Light armour, Ward Save (4+) if within 6" of a wood (or in a wood)

item.name: Ranus Heartstone
item.description: Reroll one dice used to cast or dispel (BM or PM). Can prevent miscasts and cause irresistible force. One use only.

item.name: Resplendence of Luminesc.
Resplendence of Lumi.
item.description: All attacks by the bearer and his unit count as magical.

item.name: Rhymers Harp
item.description: Bearer, mount and unit he is with can move through difficult terrain without penalty and gain a Ward Save (5+).

item.name: Royal Standard of Ariel
item.description: Bearer and unit cause Fear. In addition friendly units within 12" gain MR(1).

item.name: Shadow Bow
item.description: Woodelf Bow, no AS

item.name: Shadow Mist PM 2/5+
Shadow Mist PM 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", Ward Save (5+) vs cc attacks until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Spear of Twilight
item.description: Counts as a spear. Killing Blow.

item.name: St. of Crystal Mere
Stone of Crystal Mere
item.description: Ward Save (3+) for bearer and mount. A mount with the “Large Target" special rule does not benefit from this effect. The item is destroyed after its ward save is failed for the first time.

item.name: Staff of Sorcery
item.description: +1 to total roll to attempt to dispel a spell.

item.name: Strangle Roots (special rule)
Strangle Roots
item.description: Shooting Attack, Range 6", S4. Can be used even when the model has marched. The attack has 2D6 shots that hit like a template weapon (see Templates in core rules). No Stand and Shoot.

item.name: Talismanic Tattoos
item.description: Magic Resistance (1), Ward Save (6+)

item.name: Wall of Vines PM 2/5+
Wall of Vines PM 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit counts as defending a fence (on all sides). Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Wand of Wych Elm
item.description: Reroll failed dispel rolls.

item.name: War Banner
item.description: +1CR

item.name: Wardancer
item.description: - Shadowdances of Loec: At the start of each combat phase a unit of Wardancers has to choose one of the dances of Loec and gets the respective benefit until the start of the next combat phase. The same dance cannot be chosen in two consecutive rounds of combat. - Storm of Blades: reroll failed to-hit rolls of natural 1s - Whirling Death: Killing Blow - Shadows Coil: Ward Save (4+) vs cc attacks - Woven Mist: ASF and -1A - Wardancers can only be joined by characters with the Wardancer special rule. Wardancer characters can only join units of Wardancers.

item.name: Woodelf Bow
item.description: Longbow, S4 at short range if bearer is on foot

item.name: Wraithstone
item.description: All enemy units within 6" of the bearer suffer -1 Ld.

item.name: RX
item.description: Spites

item.name: X
item.description: Spites
